verbose_text: Due to previous reports describing that ANX A1 modulates the ERK signaling pathway at a proximal site and knockdown of ANX A1 inhibits ERK1/2 activation, an inhibitor of MEK / ERK, PD98059, was used in the current study to mimic the inhibitory effect caused by knockdown of ANX A1 on ERK1/2 activation.
evidence: ERK signaling pathway at a proximal site               and knockdown of ANX A1 inhibits ERK1/2
